participant_1.background:
I have never told my parents that I have never liked vegetables.
My first purchase was a new teaching outfit to inspire my students to love their bodies as much as I love mine.

i like to play outside.

participant_2.background:
I am a hard worker who is passionate about the ocean, and I am confident that I can make a positive impact on your company.
i wear a lot of purple.
I'm so good at football, my friends would be shocked to know that I hate sweet potatoes.
I love the suburbs because I have more space for my family and our movie collection.
I want to look my best, so I try to take care of my appearance.

content.text: I am a hard worker who is passionate about the ocean and I am confident that I can make a positive impact on your company.
I work in a warehouse and I love playing outside. What do you like to do outside?
I like to run, hike, and swim. Do you like any of those activities?
Yes, I love to swim! I was on my high school swim team.
That's awesome! What was your favorite event?
I was a freestyle sprinter. My favorite event was the 50-meter freestyle.
That's a great event! I was a distance swimmer. My favorite event was the 1650-yard freestyle.
Wow, that's a long event! How long did it take you to swim that?
That's amazing! I don't think I could ever swim that far.
It takes a lot of training, but it's a lot of fun.
I'm sure it is! I'm just not sure if I have the endurance for that.
You could always try it out! You might surprise yourself.
Maybe I will! Thanks for the suggestion
